stages.headline: A recipe that makes 24 cookies uses 3 1⁄2 cups of flour. How many cups of flour will be needed to make 60 cookies?
Solve for x: 5(x − 2) + 3 = 2(x + 7).
Find the total surface area, in square centimeters, of a rectangular prism that is 5 cm long, 4 cm wide, and 3 cm tall.
A jacket originally costs $80 but is on sale for 35 % off. What is the sale price of the jacket, in dollars?
Lines m and n are parallel. A transversal forms a 62° angle with line m. What is the measure, in degrees, of the corresponding angle on line n?
A cylindrical water tank has a radius of 3 m and a height of 5 m. What is the volume of the tank, in cubic meters? (Use π ≈ 3.14.)
Two number cubes (dice) are rolled. What is the probability that the sum of the two numbers rolled is 9? Express your answer as a fraction in simplest form.
If 5 apples cost $2.75, what is the cost of 12 apples?
Simplify the expression: 3(2x + 4) - 2(x - 5).
A rectangular garden is 10 feet long and 6 feet wide. There is a square flower bed in the center with sides of 3 feet. What is the area of the garden NOT covered by the flower bed, in square feet?
Last year, a town's population was 12,000. This year, the population increased by 15%. What is the current population of the town?
On a map, 1 inch represents 25 miles. If two cities are 3.5 inches apart on the map, what is the actual distance between them, in miles?
Find the median of the following set of numbers: 15, 23, 10, 18, 20, 12, 25.
A circular swimming pool has a diameter of 14 meters. What is the circumference of the pool, to the nearest meter? (Use π ≈ 3.14.)
Solve the system of equations: y = 2x + 1 and x + y = 10. What is the value of x?
A baker has 5 1/4 cups of sugar. He uses 2 3/8 cups for a cake. How much sugar, in cups, does he have left?
A car travels at an average speed of 60 miles per hour. How long will it take the car to travel 270 miles, in hours?
Solve for y: 4y - 7 < 13.
What is the distance between the points (2, 3) and (2, 9) on a coordinate plane?
A salesperson earns a 12% commission on all sales. If she sells $2,500 worth of merchandise, how much commission, in dollars, does she earn?
